Overview

The e-Mail Server Maven Plugin launches an e-mail server during the Maven build life-cycle for use in integration tests.

Goals

The e-Mail Server Maven Plugin has two goals

  • emailserver:run Launches the configured e-mail server.
  • emailserver:stop Shuts down the running e-mail server.

Usage

General instructions on how to use the e-Mail Server Maven Plugin can be found on the usage page.

Mail Server and Protocol Support Matrix

Mail ServerSMTPPOP3IMAPSSL
GreenmailYesYesYesYes
DumbsterYesNoNoNo
SubEtha SMTPYesNoNoNo
